metadata.title: Hydrological and Hydrochemical Data of the Sea of Okhotsk and the Western Bering Sea

creators.name: Fisheries, Russian Federal Research Institute of Marine

metadata.description: Data on temperature, salinity, oxygen, nutrients, including phosphates, ammonia nitrites, nitrates, silicates, organic phosphorus and nitrogen. 998 stations, 100 determinations of each parameter.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Complex study of ecosystem of the Sea of Okhotsk and the Bering Sea

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: As Needed

Access constraints: Intellectual property of the Institute. Permission required.

Use constraints: None
